SummaryEnglish: Lundi is a young boy who lives with his aunt and uncle in Switzerland in the early 1930s. One day while walking around the Alps, Lundi finds a little girl who is the only survivor of a plane crash and has lost all her memories. She is named Jeudi by his uncle and both of them are raised together. As they grow up together, Jeudi and Lundi develop a deep friendship for each other. A few years later Jeudi wants to find her past. Her only clue is a song that she is constantly hearing in her head, a song called Alpen Rose. At the time of World War II, Jeudi and Lundi set on a journey to discover Jeudi's past and in the process learn the depth of the love they have for each other.
TitleJapanese: 炎のアルペンローゼ・ジュディ＆ランディ
Aliases: Honoo no Alpen Rose: Judy & Randy
Alpenrose of Fire Judy and Randy: Flower of the Mountain
Alpenrose of Fire Judy and Randy

1.SummaryEnglish: Part one of a two-part OVA that summarizes the entire Honoo no Alpenrose TV series featuring a new dubbing and reworked scenes

2.SummaryEnglish: Part two of a two-part OVA that summarizes the entire Honoo no Alpenrose TV series featuring a new dubbing and reworked scenes

1.TitleEnglish: Prologue to the Torrent of Love
1.SummaryEnglish: Jeudi is an amnesic girl taken in by a boy called Lundi, she later works in a hospital away from him. But when Lundi comes to town, he sends her a letter saying that he wants to meet. This meeting leads to them encountering Count Gourmont, who takes Jeudi back to his castle, leading Lundi to go after her.

2.SummaryEnglish: Seeing that Lundi has been shot, Jeudi rushes to his aid and both of them leave the Gourmont estate, with Gourmont's men hot on their trail.

3.SummaryEnglish: Gourmont's men raid the hospital at night, forcing Jeudi and Lundi to flee to a nearby town, where they find a clue about Jeudi's past and the song "Alpen Rose".

4.SummaryEnglish: Jeudi and Lundi's train to Salzburg gets derailed by a bomb, they also get another hint about the song "Alpenrose".

5.TitleEnglish: The Past Hidden in the Garden
5.SummaryEnglish: Jeudi arrives in Salzburg alone and tries to find Leonhard Aschenbach, the only lead she has to the song of Alpen Rose. However, Count Gourmont and his men aren’t far behind.

6.SummaryEnglish: After meeting Leon, Jeudi and him embark on a journey to find information leading to her parents. However, this leads them to the Nazi Headquarters building, wherein they must find a document relating to anti-Nazi conspirators.

7.TitleEnglish: Resound! To the Skies of our Homeland
7.SummaryEnglish: Aschenbach plans to hold a concert for the Nazi’s, he aims to use this concert to escape with Jeudi during the second act where the hall will go dark.

8.SummaryEnglish: On the way to Switzerland, Jeudi and Leon’s train is searched by Gourmont’s men, forcing them to improvise to avoid capture. Meanwhile, Lundi finds a clue about Jeudi’s whereabouts, but Marie doesn’t want him to leave.

9.SummaryEnglish: Hot on the trail of Jeudi and Leon, Gourmount and his men desperately follow them everywhere they go. All seems lost until they find help from a long separated friend.

10.SummaryEnglish: Arriving in Austria, the group heads to the amnesty where Jeudi’s father is located. After a heartfelt reunion, Jeudi remembers some of her lost memory. But their reunion is short-lived, the Nazi’s have set a trap for the anti-Nazi resistance meeting at the amnesty.

11.SummaryEnglish: Leon is captured by Gourmount, a letter is sent inviting Jeudi and Lundi to come and save him. But not everything goes as planned, an unexpected person enters the scene…burning out the counts ambition with a touching farewell.

12.SummaryEnglish: Arriving at the home of Jeudi’s grandparents, Jeudi is shocked to learn that there is another girl by the name of Alicia. To make matters worse, she cannot even tell her mother who she is because she might have a heart attack due to her weak heart.

13.SummaryEnglish: After being forced to leave her family home, Jeudi ventures into the forest alone. Meanwhile, Lundi takes action and goes to General Gizan for help to look for Jeudi and removing Tronchant from the Dunant family.

14.SummaryEnglish: Jeudi’s grandfather suggests that Lundi becomes part of their family, leading Lundi back home where a startling revelation will force him to leave Jeudi once again.

15.SummaryEnglish: Heading into France to find Lundi and his brother, Jeudi and Leon come under fire from Nazi soldiers. Forcing them to hide in a hotel in a small town, where the come upon a red-haired woman with a tragic past.

16.SummaryEnglish: While on a train Jeudi and Leon are set upon by a small boy called Hans, he offers information in exchange for money. They stop in a nearby town and are caught up in his antics with the local Nazi soldiers, which puts themselves in a spot of bother.

17.SummaryEnglish: Jeudi and Leon finally make it to Paris, meeting up with Mr Robert’s they find out that Lundi has been meeting with a mysterious assassin called “tarantula”.

18.SummaryEnglish: Jeudi, Lundi and Leon arrive in Marseille, aiming to board a boat to take them back home. However, Lundi cannot leave his brother to his fate and jumps off the boat to find him once more.

19.SummaryEnglish: The gang run into Mr. Heinrich again, he tells them of a plot against General Gizan: Count Gourmount has ordered his assassination. It’s up to Jeudi and friends to thwart his evil plan.

20.SummaryEnglish: Upon informing General Gizan by radio, he turns around and avoids being assassinated. However, this has caused Jeudi and friends to be captured by Duboir.
